It's neat how when OpenAI or another model provider creates a new model (e.g. text-to-video like Sora), the open source community gets to work and produces an open source version. This happened with Sora (although the quality is not quite there yet):

- Space: <https://huggingface.co/spaces/THUDM/CogVideoX-5B-Space>
- Model Card: <https://huggingface.co/THUDM/CogVideoX-5b>
